member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresAssemblyFilesAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the specified member requires assembly files to be on disk.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresAssemblyFilesAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresAssemblyFilesAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A message that contains information about the need for assembly files to be on disk.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresAssemblyFilesAttribute.Message
member.summary: Gets an optional message that contains information about the need for assembly files to be on disk.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresAssemblyFilesAttribute.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional URL that contains more information about the member, why it requires assembly files to be on disk, and what options a consumer has to deal with it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the specified method requires dynamic access to code that is not referenced statically, for example through .
member.remarks: This allows tools to understand which methods are unsafe to call when removing unreferenced code from an application.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified message.
member.param: A message that contains information about the usage of unreferenced code.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute.Message
member.summary: Gets a message that contains information about the usage of unreferenced code.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional URL that contains more information about the method, why it requires unreferenced code, and what options a consumer has to deal with it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that null is allowed as an input even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DisallowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that null is disallowed as an input even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output may be null even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output will not be null even if the corresponding type allows it. Specifies that an input argument was not null when the call returns.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter may be null even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter may be null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter will not be null even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the output will be non-null if the named parameter is non-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the associated parameter name.
member.param: The associated parameter name. The output will be non-null if the argument to the parameter specified is non-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute.ParameterName
member.summary: Gets the associated parameter name.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute
member.summary: Applied to a method that will never return under any circumstance.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method will not return if the associated Boolean parameter is passed the specified value.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified parameter value.
member.param: The condition parameter value. Code after the method will be considered unreachable by diagnostics if the argument to the associated parameter matches this value.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.ParameterValue
member.summary: Gets the condition parameter value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with a field or property member.
member.param: The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the list of field and property members.
member.param: The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values when returning with the specified return value condition.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and a field or property member.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and list of field and property members.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: P:System.SR.ArgumentNull_GetterOrSetterMustBeSpecified
member.summary: Either 'getter' or 'setter' must be specified.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_GetMethNotFnd
member.summary: The get accessor of the property was not found.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_PropertyTypeFromDifferentContext
member.summary: The property type needs to be mapped to the current ReflectionContext.

member.name: P:System.SR.Format_AttributeUsage
member.summary: Duplicate AttributeUsageAttribute records found on attribute type {0}.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_AddNullProperty
member.summary: AddProperties returned a null property.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_AddPropertyDifferentContext
member.summary: AddProperties returned a property not created by CustomReflectionContext.CreateProperty in the current reflection context.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_AddPropertyDifferentType
member.summary: AddProperties returned a property that has already been added to another type.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_EnumLitValueNotFound
member.summary: Literal value was not found.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_InvalidMemberType
member.summary: The member {0} has an invalid MemberType {1}.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_InvalidMethodType
member.summary: The method is neither a MethodInfo nor a ConstructorInfo: {0}.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_NotGenericMethodDefinition
member.summary: {0} is not a GenericMethodDefinition. MakeGenericMethod may only be called on a method for which MethodBase.IsGenericMethodDefinition is true.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_NoTypeInfoForThisType
member.summary: Cannot get the TypeInfo object from the Type object: {0}.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidOperation_NullAttribute
member.summary: The attribute object cannot be null.

member.name: P:System.SR.PlatformNotSupported_ReflectionContext
member.summary: Customized reflection contexts are only supported on .NET Framework.

member.name: P:System.SR.Target_InstanceMethodRequiresTarget
member.summary: Non-static method requires a target.

member.name: P:System.SR.Target_ObjectTargetMismatch
member.summary: Object does not match target type.

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_ObjectArgumentMismatch
member.summary: Object of type '{0}' cannot be converted to type '{1}'.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to indicate a source generator should create a function for marshalling arguments instead of relying on the runtime to generate an equivalent marshalling function at run-time.
member.remarks: This attribute is meaningless if the source generator associated with it is not enabled. The current built-in source generator only supports C# and only supplies an implementation when applied to static, partial, non-generic methods.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .
member.param: Name of the library containing the import.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.LibraryName
member.summary: Gets the name of the library containing the import.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.EntryPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the entry point to be called.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.StringMarshalling
member.summary: Gets or sets how to marshal string arguments to the method.
member.remarks: If this field is set to a value other than , must not be specified.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.StringMarshallingCustomType
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to control how string arguments to the method are marshalled.
member.remarks: If this field is specified, must not be specified or must be set to .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.SetLastError
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the callee sets an error (SetLastError on Windows or errno on other platforms) before returning from the attributed method.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling
member.summary: Specifies how strings should be marshalled for generated p/invokes

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Custom
member.summary: Indicates the user is suppling a specific marshaller in .

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Utf8
member.summary: Use the platform-provided UTF-8 marshaller.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Utf16
member.summary: Use the platform-provided UTF-16 marshaller.
